name: Accelerant (Shadowaduro)
description:
Accelerent is a platformer/dungeon escape type game.

It starts off as a side on third person platformer with the player attempting to reach home before a huge storm hits after collecting the weekly supplies their family needs, and turns into a first person experience as the player races to escape the underground and reach home before they are caught by the mutated creatures.

First Gamejam game attempt - will attempt to further develop and improve the game later on.

Third Party:

Several scripts were created under the guidance of Aaron Fryer.
The easter egg within the first enemy spawn -

The music was made using music maker jam.

Controls -

In the First Section - A & D to move, space to jump, there is a double jump but the double jump can only be used if the first jump was while the player was still on the ground

In the Second Section - W, A, S & D to move around, though you can use the mouse and just W to also get you in all directions as the player rotates with the mouse, there is also a jump in this section but there is no real use to it.

Cursor Lock - To disable cursor lock press Q. To enable cursor lock left mouseclick on the screen.

Quitting The Game - Press the escape to quit the game in the levels and click the Quit button when in the main menu or victory menu.

Dialogue Boxes - The Dialogue Box in the first section and second section deactivates upon jumping once.
